mapper.insert: insert into t_sys_user (user_code, user_name, user_acct, user_pwd, is_admin, id_card, sex, tel, phone, email, ip, remark, is_deleted, id, sort_no, gmt_create, create_by, gmt_modified, last_modified_by, version, role, headpicture_url ) values (#{userId}, #{userName}, #{userAcct}, #{userPassword}, #{role}, #{idCard}, #{sex}, #{tel}, #{phone}, #{mail}, #{ip}, #{remark}, #{isDeleted}, #{id}, 0, now(), #{createBy}, NOW(), #{lastModifiedBy}, 0, #{role}, #{imagePath} )
mapper.select: select user_code userId, user_name userName, user_acct userAcct, user_pwd userPassword, role role, id_card idCard, sex sex, phone phone, email mail, headpicture_url userImage, version version from t_sys_user where user_code = #{userId} and is_deleted = 0

select a.user_code userId, a.user_name userName, a.user_acct userAcct, a.role role, a.id_card idCard, a.sex sex, a.phone phone, a.email mail, a.version version from t_sys_user a where a.is_deleted = 0
and a.user_acct like concat('%', #{userAcct}, '%')
and a.user_name like concat('%', #{userName}, '%')
and a.role like concat('%', #{role}, '%')
and a.role in (1,2) order by gmt_create desc
